description: The tables in the data lake that are registered in the Data Lake Deletion Framework

schema.name: database
schema.description: The name of database in the data lake

schema.name: table
schema.description: The name of the table in the data lake

schema.name: customer_identification_column
schema.description: The name of the column that references a Samsara customer

schema.name: group
schema.description: The deletion group of the table. This is used for deletion prioritization

schema.name: format
schema.description: The format of the table's physical data (e.g., 'delta', 'parquet', 'csv', 'json')
